Email Manager

Help

The Email Manager allows you to define Emailing lists and create Email Campaigns. You can search for an Email Campaign by entering its name, send date or status in the Find text box below and clicking the "Go" button. 20 Email Campaigns are displayed at a time. Click the "Previous Page" or "Next Page" links to view additional Email Campaigns. New Emailing lists can be defined by clicking the "Emailing Lists" link in the upper right hand corner of this page. New Email Campaigns can be defined by clicking the "New Email Campaign" link in the upper right hand corner of this page.
Email Date
Messages
Email List
Sales Prospect Email
Enter a unique name and the desired options for this email Campaign. Change the Status from "Compose" to "Ready" when you are ready for the Campaign to be sent.
Messages Sent In

Enter your email message in the editor below. This message and the "Subject" above may include replacable tags enclosed in curly brackets for the recipient's first name {firstname}, last name {lastname}, email address {email}, {data1}, {data2}, {data3}, {data4} and {data5} as defined by the specified emailing list.

Enter a date for this Email Campaign to be sent. The system will send all Campaigns with a status of "Ready" that have a blank or past send date at the end of the day. Once a Campaign is sent the status is changed to "Sent". The mesage can be repeated by entering a number followed by a single letter (d,w,m) for a (day, week, month). For example: 7d will send the Campaign once every 7 days, and is the same as 1w. The End Date specifies when to stop repeating this Campaign. A repeated Campaign with a blank End Date will be sent indefinately.
TEST EMAIL: Enter an email address, first name, last name (and optional data1, data2, data3, data4, data5) and click the "Test Email Message" button to email a preview of this Campaign.
Enter a unique name and the desired options for this prospect email message. Change the Status from "Compose" to "Ready" when it is ready to be used.

Enter your email message in the editor below. This message and the "Subject" above may include replacable tags enclosed in curly brackets for the prospect's first name {firstname}, last name {lastname}, unique identifier {id}, member's first name {m-firstname}, member's last name {m-lastname}, member's email address {m-email} and member's email signature {signature}. The "from email" may also specify the member's email address {m-email}.

The email message may include one or more links to a utility URL that can play a video file, display a custom page, update the next step for the prospect, and record an RSVP response. all parameters are optional. A typical email message may contain multiple links to the same URL to take different actions based on the prospect's selection. The RSVP can indicate a positive response (1), a negative response (2), or any other value of importance. A note will be added by the system documenting the RSVP response, video watched, and page viewed. An example of the RSVP URL:
TEST EMAIL: Enter an email address, first name and last name and click the "Test Email" button to send the email, or click the "Preview Email" button to view the email.

Team Email Manager
Add New Email

The Team Email Manager allows you to send Email to your team members. You can search for an existing Email by entering its name, send date or status in the Find text box below and clicking the "Go" button. 20 Emails are displayed at a time. Click the "Previous Page" or "Next Page" links to view additional Emails. New Emails can be created by clicking the "Add New Email" link above.
